title: Sad times for a poor soul
body: Ah, A mere 2 RP ruins my hopes and dreams.

replies.body: a simple support ticket with a drawing of something lol related will get you the rp, they do give out small amounts to people when they need it, but it can only be done 1 or 2 times.
hopefully they wont give it to u
rekt I realized that Sivir is a dumpster and getting Snow Bunny Nidalee + Poro icon would be way more worth it D:
